content:
Show? What show?
Oh, Parade Station broadcasts? I don't really pay attention to those.
Their celestial forecasts aren't precise enough.
They say Parade Station collects data from every bubble universe and customizes its daily programs based on that.

Hey, what are you up to?
During the day, I try to conserve my energy and limit my movement,
So I can be bright and alert when observing the stars at night.

Such an intelligent analysis device...（思考）
Can't we use it for analyzing research papers?!（期待）

<size=28>I forecast clear night skies,

but when I try to observe, my telescope 

keeps showing things that shouldn't be there... How mysterious, yeep~</size>
